sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updating label for the table "sp_page_title_variable" from "Dynamic page title variables" to "Dynamic page variables"</description>
        <name>Update Label of "sp_page_title_variable"</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
	gs.info('Updating label for the table "sp_page_title_variable" from "Dynamic page title variables" to "Dynamic page variables"');
	var glideRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
	glideRecord.addQuery('name', '=', 'sp_page_title_variable');
	glideRecord.query();
	if(glideRecord.next()) {
		glideRecord.setValue('label', 'Dynamic page variables');
		glideRecord.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-21 13:14:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6799f2dd77c211103b0efc3eaf5a99a3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Label of "sp_page_title_variable"</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">3c3878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37f0b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6799f2dd77c211103b0efc3eaf5a99a3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-21 11:48:34</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
